RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: untilde [hello@untilde.net]
RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: TimeZigs
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: Generate patterns with custom time signatures based on current LPB. Supports odd time signatures, auto section naming and more. Based on Esa Ruoho's Paketti Slab O' Patterns (https://github.com/esaruoho/paketti/blob/master/PakettiSlabOPatterns.lua)
